summary: ActionScript 3.0 syntax file with regular expressions
name: actionscript.vim--Cuss
description: Improves vimscript #1061 by adding regular expression support. Nothing fancy.
install_details:
As for vimscript #1061. An easy way is to install this into /usr/share/vim/vimcurrent/syntax/ or $HOME/.vim/syntax, and then add the following to your .vimrc to override the default "Atlas" association:

au Bufread,BufNewFile *.as set filetype=actionscript
